item.title: ECW 2022 - Minifilter
item.description: Minifilter is a reverse-engineering challenge I designed for the 2022 edition of the European Cyber Week. Here is the source code for this challenge. For this challenge, you’re given a truc.sys driver and a file.txt.lock file and the following scenario: “some user tried to save his file using her notepad but the saved file looks funny. Find out what’s going on there, find the file.txt cleartext”. The truc.sys implements a Windows minifilter that is xor-encoding the file when saved to disk.
